title: RadioBroadcastContentItemFields
description: Additional fields specific to radio broadcast content items in the Impresso project

source_medium_s.description: Medium of the source (radio broadcasts use audio)

record_id_ss.description: Array of record identifiers for radio broadcast segments

record_nb_is.description: Array of record numbers corresponding to radio broadcast segments

nb_record_i.description: Total number of records/segments in the radio broadcast

start_time_s.description: Start time of the radio broadcast in HH:MM:SS format

duration_s.description: Duration of the radio broadcast in HH:MM:SS format

radio_channel_s.description: Name of the radio channel that aired the broadcast

radio_program_s.description: Name of the radio program or show

ub_plain.description: Utterance breaks as plain text. TODO: Explain this well
